document_data.name: unseen wagon
document_data.mainbody: '''''Unseen wagon''''' was a spell devised by [[Kurtal]]. It was lost as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Effects: The spell was akin to ''[[Tenser's floating disk]]'', except it had vertical sides, was waterproof and so could store liquids, and the contents were made invisible.The effect is gleaned and deduced from the title and description; the spell in this article is assumed to be a force-based evocation and illusion.
document_data.History: The spell was developed by [[Kurtal]]. It was both lost and superseded by the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
